name: Just Another Platformer (Pre Alpha - v0.4)
description:
PLEASE NOTE:

We recently changed our name from: 'Paragon Games Company' to 'Honeycomb Studios'

There is a chance that none or only a few of the existing weapons, textures mechanics, sprites, and animations will exist in the full realease. There are only nine levels so far.

CONTROLS

A - Go left

D - Go right

Space - Jump

Left click - Shoot

Right click - Read signs and Flip Levers

Up arrow - Up in menu

Down arrow - Down in menu

Enter - Select in menu

WHAT'S NEW:

Balanced weapons and bosses, level 10, second boss, speedrun mode, core defense mode, resprited player,  resprited enemies, added drones 

HOW TO DOWNLOAD:

Download the .zip, extract the folder, and run jap.exe

Buisness email: honeycombstu@gmail.com

Discord server: https://discord.gg/Xv3KG2T

Leave any suggestions you have below!
